questions.question: Analyze the manufacturing_iot_dataset.csv and create visualizations showing the relationship between temperature, vibration, and alarm status over time.
Find correlations between equipment parameters (temperature, pressure, vibration, current) and production quality in the manufacturing dataset.
Identify when alarms are triggered in the manufacturing data and what conditions lead to them. Show me a timeline visualization.
Analyze the tmdb_10000_movies_dataset.csv and show me the top 20 highest-rated movies with at least 1000 votes. Create a visualization.
Show me trends in movie ratings and popularity over the years. Which decades produced the best movies?
Analyze the distribution of movies by language and show which languages have the highest average ratings.
What can you help me with? Show me your data analysis capabilities.
